import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import NewsCard from '../components/NewsCard' function Home() { const [news,setNews]=useState() const [pendingApiCall,setPendingApiCall]=useState(true) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("https://newsapi.org/v2/top-headlines?country=tr&apiKey=f440eaf214bf4f48ad71022fcb003e5b") .then((res)=>{ setNews(res) setPendingApiCall(false) }) },[]) return ( <>
  • Haberler
  • Türkiye
  • Ekonomi
  • Teknoloji
) } export default Home
